*Watches Suukie die. Realizes that there was nothing she could do to save 
him.  She sadly walked back to the Maximal base and hoped that she would be 
able to save what little honor she felt that she had left.*



----Original Message---------
>From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

>
>Have to help, have to help." Suukie mumbled. Sinesis looked down at Suukie
>and Sinister pulled out a sword, which pleased Sinesis and convinced him
>that Sinister knew his weapons. Sinesis smashed his axe into Suukie, who
>hardly nooticed that he was dying.
>
>"Die you Transformer wanabe!" Sinister yelled, bringing his sword down at
>high speed at Suukie.
>
>"Suukie, does not exist." Suukie said. Sinister's sword smashed into him,
>and Suukie just stared into the future, a flash of some weird bot with
>familiar eyes, and a flash of Plintissa crying, a flash of Lightmare and
>Gangon, and even a flash of Iron Raptor...
